00064         if( inside_shape ) delete inside_shape;
00065         if( inside_time_shape ) delete inside_time_shape;
00066         if( hownear_shape ) delete hownear_shape;
00067         if( howfar_shape ) delete howfar_shape;
00068         if( howfar_time_shape ) delete howfar_time_shape;

00072         EGS_Object::deleteObject(hownear_shape);
00073         EGS_Object::deleteObject(hownear_time_shape);
00074         EGS_Object::deleteObject(howfar_shape);
00075         EGS_Object::deleteObject(howfar_time_shape);
00076     };

00119 EGS_GeometryTester::EGS_GeometryTester(EGS_Input *i) {
00120     p = new EGS_PrivateTester(this,i);
00121 }

00123 EGS_GeometryTester::~EGS_GeometryTester() {
00124     delete p;

00151 void EGS_GeometryTester::printPosition(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00152     fprintf(p->fp_this_test,"%g %g %g\n",x.x,x.y,x.z);

00155 #ifndef SKIP_DOXYGEN
00156 EGS_PrivateTester::EGS_PrivateTester(EGS_GeometryTester *p, EGS_Input *input) {
00157     if (!p) egsFatal("EGS_PrivateTester::EGS_PrivateTester:\n"
00158                          " attempt to construct a tester with a null parent\n");
00159     parent = p;
00160     rndm = 0;
00161     n_inside = 0;
00162     n_inside_time = 0;
00163     n_hownear = 0;
00164     n_hownear_time = 0;
00165     n_howfar = 0;
00166     n_howfar_time = 0;
00167     inside_shape = 0;
00168     inside_time_shape = 0;
00169     hownear_shape = 0;
00170     howfar_shape = 0;
00171     hownear_time_shape = 0;
00172     howfar_time_shape = 0;
00173     hownear_shape = 0;
00174     store_steps = true;
00175     check_infinity = true;
00176     fp_info = stdout;
00177     fp_warn = stderr;
00178     fp_inside = stdout;
00179     fp_hownear = stdout;
00180     fp_howfar = stdout;
00181 
00182     rndm = EGS_RandomGenerator::createRNG(input);
00183     if (!rndm) {
00184         rndm = EGS_RandomGenerator::defaultRNG();
00185     }
00186 
00187     setTest(input,"inside test",n_inside,&inside_shape);
00188     fp_inside = fp_this_test;
00189 
00190     setTest(input,"inside time test",n_inside_time,&inside_time_shape);
00191 
00192     setTest(input,"hownear test",n_hownear,&hownear_shape);
00193     fp_hownear = fp_this_test;
00194 
00195     setTest(input,"hownear time test",n_hownear_time,&hownear_time_shape);
00196 
00197     setTest(input,"howfar test",n_howfar,&howfar_shape);
00198     fp_howfar = fp_this_test;
00199 
00200     setTest(input,"howfar time test",n_howfar_time,&howfar_time_shape);
00201 
00202 }
00203 
00204 void EGS_PrivateTester::setTest(EGS_Input *input, const char *delim, int &n,
00205                                 EGS_BaseShape **s) {
00206     EGS_Input *i = input->takeInputItem(delim);
00207     if (!i) fprintf(fp_warn,"EGS_PrivateTester::EGS_setTest: \n"
00208                         "  no '%s' specification\n",delim);
00209     else {
00210         string shape_name;
00211         int ierr = i->getInput("bounding shape name",shape_name);
00212         EGS_BaseShape *shape = 0;
00213         if (!ierr) {
00214             shape = EGS_BaseShape::getShape(shape_name);
00215         }
00216         if (!shape) {
00217             EGS_Input *ishape = i->takeInputItem("bounding shape");
00218             if (!ishape) fprintf(fp_warn,"EGS_PrivateTester::EGS_setTest: \n"
00219                                      "  no 'bounding shape' definition for %s\n",delim);
00220             else {
00221                 shape = EGS_BaseShape::createShape(ishape);
00222                 delete ishape;
00223             }
00224         }
00225         if (!shape) fprintf(fp_warn,"EGS_PrivateTester::EGS_PrivateTester:"
00226                                 "\n  got null shape for %s\n",delim);
00227         else {
00228             shape->ref();
00229             *s = shape;
00230         }
00231         int err = i->getInput("ntest",n);
00232         if (err) fprintf(fp_warn,"EGS_PrivateTester::setTest: \n"
00233                              "  missing/wrong 'ntest' input for %s\n",delim);
00234         string fname;
00235         fp_this_test = stdout;
00236         err = i->getInput("file name",fname);
00237         if (!err && fname.size() > 0) {
00238             fp_this_test = fopen(fname.c_str(),"w");
00239             if (!fp_this_test) {
00240                 fprintf(fp_warn,"EGS_PrivateTester::setTest: \n"
00241                         "  failed to open file %s from writing\n",fname.c_str());
00242                 fp_this_test = stdout;
00243             }
00244         }
00245         int ci;
00246         err = i->getInput("check infinity",ci);
00247         if (!err && ci == 0) {
00248             check_infinity = false;
00249         }
00250 
00251         string delimeter(delim);
00252         if (delimeter == "howfar time test") {
00253             string ss;
00254             i->getInput("store steps",ss);
00255             if (ss == "no" || ss == "0") {
00256                 fprintf(fp_info,"will not store steps in howfar test\n");
00257                 store_steps = false;
00258             }
00259         }
00260 
00261         delete i;
00262     }
00263 }
00264 
00265 void EGS_PrivateTester::testInside(EGS_BaseGeometry *g) {
00266     if (beginTest(n_inside,inside_shape,"testInside()","inside test",g)) {
00267         return;
00268     }
00269     int n_in = 0;
00270     fp_this_test = fp_inside;
00271     for (int j=0; j<n_inside; j++) {
00272         EGS_Vector x = inside_shape->getRandomPoint(rndm);
00273         int ireg = g->inside(x);
00274         if (ireg >= 0) {
00275             n_in++;
00276             parent->printPosition(x);
00277         }
00278     }
00279     fprintf(fp_info,"finished inside test. Point inside: %d (%g)\n",
00280             n_in,((double) n_in)/((double) n_inside));
00281 }
00282 
00283 void EGS_PrivateTester::testInsideTime(EGS_BaseGeometry *g) {
00284     if (beginTest(n_inside_time,inside_time_shape,"testInsideTime()",
00285                   "inside time test",g)) {
00286         return;
00287     }
00288     int n_in = 0;
00289     EGS_Timer t;
00290     for (int j=0; j<n_inside_time; j++) {
00291         EGS_Vector x = inside_time_shape->getRandomPoint(rndm);
00292         int ireg = g->inside(x);
00293         if (ireg >= 0) {
00294             n_in++;
00295         }
00296     }
00297     EGS_Float cpu = t.time();
00298     fprintf(fp_info,"finished inside time test.\n");
00299     fprintf(fp_info,"   point inside: %d (%g)\n",n_in,
00300             ((double) n_in)/((double) n_inside_time));
00301     fprintf(fp_info,"   cpu time: %g seconds\n",cpu);
00302 }
00303 
00304 void EGS_PrivateTester::testHownear(int ntry, EGS_BaseGeometry *g) {
00305     if (ntry < 1) {
00306         fprintf(fp_warn,"EGS_GeometryTester::testHownear(): ntry must be >0\n");
00307         return;
00308     }
00309     if (beginTest(n_hownear,hownear_shape,"testHownear()","hownear test",g)) {
00310         return;
00311     }
00312     int n_fail = 0;
00313     for (int j=0; j<n_hownear; j++) {
00314         EGS_Vector x = hownear_shape->getRandomPoint(rndm);
00315         int ireg = g->inside(x);
00316         EGS_Float tperp = g->hownear(ireg,x);
00317         for (int i=0; i<ntry; i++) {
00318             EGS_Float cost = 2*rndm->getUniform()-1;
00319             EGS_Float sint = tperp*sqrt(1-cost*cost);
00320             EGS_Float cphi, sphi;
00321             rndm->getAzimuth(cphi,sphi);
00322             EGS_Vector xi(x.x+sint*cphi,x.y+sint*sphi,x.z+tperp*cost);
00323             int ireg_i = g->inside(xi);
00324             if (ireg_i != ireg) {
00325                 n_fail++;
00326                 fprintf(fp_hownear," point (%g,%g,%g) with tperp=%g fails for "
00327                         "(%g,%g,%g): %d %d\n",x.x,x.y,x.z,tperp,xi.x,xi.y,xi.z,ireg,ireg_i);
00328             }
00329         }
00330     }
00331     fprintf(fp_info,"finished hownear test. number of failed points: %d\n",
00332             n_fail);
00333 }
00334 
00335 void EGS_PrivateTester::testHownearTime(EGS_BaseGeometry *g) {
00336     if (beginTest(n_hownear_time,hownear_time_shape,"testHownearTime()",
00337                   "hownear time test",g)) {
00338         return;
00339     }
00340     double sum_tperp = 0;
00341     EGS_Timer t;
00342     for (int j=0; j<n_hownear_time; j++) {
00343         EGS_Vector x = hownear_time_shape->getRandomPoint(rndm);
00344         int ireg = g->inside(x);
00345         sum_tperp += g->hownear(ireg,x);
00346     }
00347     EGS_Float cpu = t.time();
00348     fprintf(fp_info,"finished hownear time test.\n");
00349     fprintf(fp_info,"   average tperp: %g\n",sum_tperp/n_hownear_time);
00350     fprintf(fp_info,"   cpu time: %g seconds\n",cpu);
00351 }
00352 
00353 
00354 #define N_MAX_STEP 200
00355 
00356 void EGS_PrivateTester::testHowfar(EGS_BaseGeometry *g, bool time) {
00357     EGS_Vector positions[N_MAX_STEP];
00358     int regions[N_MAX_STEP];
00359     int btest;
00360     int ncase;
00361     EGS_BaseShape *hshape;
00362     bool ss;
00363     if (time) {
00364         ncase = n_howfar_time;
00365         btest = beginTest(n_howfar_time,howfar_time_shape,"testHowfarTime()",
00366                           "howfar time test",g);
00367         hshape = howfar_time_shape;
00368         ss = store_steps;
00369         fprintf(fp_info,"Store steps: %d\n",ss);
00370     }
00371     else {
00372         ncase = n_howfar;
00373         btest = beginTest(n_howfar,howfar_shape,"testHowfar()","howfar test",g);
00374         hshape = howfar_shape;
00375         ss = true;
00376     }
00377     if (btest) {
00378         return;
00379     }
00380     const EGS_AffineTransform *T = hshape->getTransform();
00381     egsWarning("has transofrmation: %d\n",(T != 0));
00382     //EGS_BaseGeometry::geometry_error = &__geometry_error;
00383     EGS_Timer timer;
00384     fp_this_test = fp_howfar;
00385     double nstep = 0;
00386     for (int j=0; j<ncase; j++) {
00387         EGS_Vector x = hshape->getRandomPoint(rndm);
00388         EGS_Float cost = 2*rndm->getUniform()-1;
00389         EGS_Float sint = sqrt(1-cost*cost);
00390         EGS_Float cphi, sphi;
00391         rndm->getAzimuth(cphi,sphi);
00392         EGS_Vector u(sint*cphi,sint*sphi,cost);
00393         EGS_Vector Xo(x);
00394         bool go_back = true;
00395         //egsWarning("x = (%g,%g,%g) u = (%g,%g,%g)\n",x.x,x.y,x.z,u.x,u.y,u.z);
00396 retry:
00397         //if( !go_back ) egsWarning("Initial position: (%g,%g,%g) direction: "
00398         //      "(%g,%g,%g)\n",x.x,x.y,x.z,u.x,u.y,u.z);
00399         EGS_Float t_step = 1e15;
00400         int ireg = g->inside(x);
00401         int ireg_first = ireg;
00402         ireg = g->howfar(ireg,x,u,t_step);
00403         if (ireg < 0 && ireg != ireg_first && !time) {
00404             EGS_Vector tmp(x + u*t_step);
00405             parent->printPosition(tmp);
00406         }
00407         //egsWarning("ireg: %d new_ireg: %d t = %g\n",ireg_first,ireg,t_step);
00408         int n_step = 0;
00409         if (ireg >= 0) {
00410             x += u*t_step;
00411             if (ss) {
00412                 positions[n_step] = x;
00413                 regions[n_step++] = ireg;
00414             }
00415             if (!time) {
00416                 parent->printPosition(x);
00417             }
00418         }
00419         //if( !go_back && ireg >= 0 ) egsWarning("Starting loop: ireg=%d "
00420         //       "x=(%g,%g,%g)\n",ireg,x.x,x.y,x.z);
00421         while (ireg >= 0) {
00422             t_step = 1e15;
00423             int ireg_new = g->howfar(ireg,x,u,t_step);
00424             //if( !go_back ) egsWarning("new region=%d step=%g x=(%g,%g,%g)\n",
00425             //        ireg_new,t_step,x.x,x.y,x.z);
00426             //if( __geometry_error ) {
00427             //    egsWarning("Geometry error occured\n");
00428             //    __geometry_error = 0;
00429             //    if( go_back ) {
00430             //        go_back = false; x = Xo; goto retry;
00431             //    }
00432             //}
00433             if (ireg_new == ireg) {
00434                 break;
00435             }
00436             // if the above condition is true,
00437             // we assume to be in an anfinite geometry with a direction
00438             // such that we never get out.
00439             ireg = ireg_new;
00440             x += u*t_step;
00441             nstep += 1;
00442             if (ss) {
00443                 positions[n_step] = x;
00444                 regions[n_step++] = ireg;
00445                 if (n_step >= N_MAX_STEP) {
00446                     if (go_back) {
00447                         egsWarning("testHowfar(): number of steps exceeded %d for"
00448                                    " case %d:\n",N_MAX_STEP,j+1);
00449                         egsWarning("  direction = (%g,%g,%g)\n",u.x,u.y,u.z);
00450                         egsWarning("  initial position = (%g,%g,%g) region = %d\n",
00451                                    Xo.x,Xo.y,Xo.z,ireg_first);
00452                         for (int j=0; j<N_MAX_STEP; j++)
00453                             egsWarning("x = (%g,%g,%g) ireg = %d\n",positions[j].x,
00454                                        positions[j].y,positions[j].z,regions[j]);
00455                         go_back = false;
00456                         g->setDebug(true);
00457                         x = Xo;
00458                         goto retry;
00459                     }
00460                     egsFatal("\nQuiting now\n\n");
00461                 }
00462             }
00463             if (!time) {
00464                 if (check_infinity && x.length2() > 1e10) {
00465                     egsWarning("testHowfar(): x -> infinity for case %d?\n",
00466                                j+1);
00467                     egsWarning("  direction = (%g,%g,%g)\n",u.x,u.y,u.z);
00468                     egsWarning("  initial position = (%g,%g,%g) region = %d\n",
00469                                Xo.x,Xo.y,Xo.z,ireg_first);
00470                     for (int j=0; j<n_step; j++) egsWarning("x = (%g,%g,%g) "
00471                                                                 "ireg = %d\n",positions[j].x,positions[j].y,
00472                                                                 positions[j].z,regions[j]);
00473                 }
00474                 if (ireg >= 0) {
00475                     int itest = g->inside(x);
00476                     if (itest < 0) {
00477                         egsWarning("testHowfar(): after howfar step ireg = %d"
00478                                    " but inside() returns %d\n",ireg,itest);
00479                         egsWarning("  position = (%g,%g,%g)\n",x.x,x.y,x.z);
00480                         egsWarning("  direction = (%g,%g,%g)\n",u.x,u.y,u.z);
00481                         egsWarning("  initial position = (%g,%g,%g) "
00482                                    "region = %d\n",Xo.x,Xo.y,Xo.z,ireg_first);
00483                         for (int j=0; j<n_step; j++) egsWarning("x = (%g,%g,%g) "
00484                                                                     "ireg = %d\n",positions[j].x,positions[j].y,
00485                                                                     positions[j].z,regions[j]);
00486                         break;
00487                     }
00488                 }
00489                 parent->printPosition(x);
00490             }
00491         }
00492     }
00493     EGS_Float cpu = timer.time();
00494     if (time) {
00495         fprintf(fp_info,"finished howfar time test, cpu time = %g seconds\n",
00496                 cpu);
00497         fprintf(fp_info,"  average number of steps: %g\n",nstep/ncase);
00498     }
00499     else {
00500         fprintf(fp_info,"finished howfar test.\n");
00501     }
00502 }
00503 
00504 
00505 int EGS_PrivateTester::beginTest(int n, const EGS_BaseShape *s,
00506                                  const char *func, const char *name, const EGS_BaseGeometry *g) {
00507     if (!s) {
00508         fprintf(fp_warn,"EGS_GeometryTester::%s: no bounding shape defined\n",
00509                 func);
00510         return 1;
00511     }
00512     if (n <= 0) {
00513         fprintf(fp_warn,"EGS_GeometryTester::%s: number of test cases to run "
00514                 "is less than 1 (%d)\n",func,n);
00515         return 2;
00516     }
00517     fprintf(fp_info,"\nEGS_GeometryTester::%s: starting %s\n",func,name);
00518     fprintf(fp_info,"   number of cases: %d\n",n);
00519     fprintf(fp_info,"   bounding shape: %s\n",s->getObjectType().c_str());
00520     //fprintf(fp_info,"   geometry:\n"); g->printInfo();
00521     fprintf(fp_info,"   geometry: %s (type %s)\n",g->getName().c_str(),
00522             g->getType().c_str());
00523     return 0;
00524 }
00525 #endif
00526 
00527 #ifndef SKIP_DOXYGEN
00528 class EGS_LOCAL EGS_CylTester : public EGS_GeometryTester {
00529 public:
00530     EGS_CylTester(const EGS_Vector &A,EGS_Input *i) :
00531         EGS_GeometryTester(i), a(A) {
00532         a.normalize();
00533     };
00534     ~EGS_CylTester() {};
00535     void printPosition(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00536         EGS_Float z = x*a;
00537         EGS_Float r = sqrt(x.length2()-z*z);
00538         fprintf(p->fp_this_test,"%g %g\n",z,r);
00539     };
00540 private:
00541     EGS_Vector a;
00542 };
00543 
00544 class EGS_LOCAL EGS_SphereTester : public EGS_GeometryTester {
00545 public:
00546     EGS_SphereTester(const EGS_Vector &Xo, EGS_Input *i) :
00547         xo(Xo), EGS_GeometryTester(i) {};
00548     ~EGS_SphereTester() {};
00549     void printPosition(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00550         EGS_Vector xp(x-xo);
00551         EGS_Float r2 = xp.length2();
00552         fprintf(p->fp_this_test,"%g %g\n",xp.z,sqrt(r2-xp.z*xp.z));
00553     };
00554 private:
00555     EGS_Vector xo;
00556 };
00557 
00558 class EGS_LOCAL EGS_TransformedTester : public EGS_GeometryTester {
00559 public:
00560     EGS_TransformedTester(const EGS_AffineTransform &t, EGS_Input *i) :
00561         T(t), EGS_GeometryTester(i) {};
00562     ~EGS_TransformedTester() {};
00563     void printPosition(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00564         EGS_Vector xp(x*T);
00565         fprintf(p->fp_this_test,"%g %g %g\n",xp.x,xp.y,xp.z);
00566     };
00567 private:
00568     EGS_AffineTransform T;
00569 };
00570 #endif
00571 
00572 EGS_GeometryTester *EGS_GeometryTester::getGeometryTester(EGS_Input *input) {
00573     if (!input) {
00574         egsWarning("EGS_GeometryTester::getGeometryTester:\n"
00575                    "  input is null?\n");
00576         return 0;
00577     }
00578     bool delete_it = false;
00579     EGS_Input *i;
00580     if (input->isA("geometry tester")) {
00581         i = input;
00582     }
00583     else {
00584         i = input->takeInputItem("geometry tester");
00585         if (!i) {
00586             egsWarning("EGS_GeometryTester::getGeometryTester:\n"
00587                        "  no 'geometry tester' input\n");
00588             return 0;
00589         }
00590         delete_it = true;
00591     }
00592     EGS_Input *ishape;
00593     while ((ishape = i->takeInputItem("bounding shape"))) {
00594         egsWarning("*** adding shape\n");
00595         EGS_BaseShape::createShape(ishape);
00596         delete ishape;
00597     }
00598     string type;
00599     EGS_GeometryTester *tester;
00600     int err = i->getInput("output type",type);
00601     if (err || i->compare(type,"normal")) {
00602         tester = new EGS_GeometryTester(i);
00603     }
00604     else if (i->compare(type,"cylindrical")) {
00605         vector<EGS_Float> axis;
00606         int err1 = i->getInput("axis",axis);
00607         if (!err1 && axis.size() == 3) {
00608             tester = new EGS_CylTester(EGS_Vector(axis[0],axis[1],axis[2]),i);
00609         }
00610         else {
00611             egsWarning("EGS_GeometryTester::getGeometryTester: no 'axis'"
00612                        " input for cylindrical output type\n");
00613             tester = new EGS_GeometryTester(i);
00614         }
00615     }
00616     else if (i->compare(type,"spherical")) {
00617         vector<EGS_Float> Xo;
00618         int err1 = i->getInput("midpoint",Xo);
00619         if (!err1 && Xo.size() == 3) {
00620             tester = new EGS_SphereTester(EGS_Vector(Xo[0],Xo[1],Xo[2]),i);
00621         }
00622         else {
00623             tester = new EGS_SphereTester(EGS_Vector(),i);
00624         }
00625     }
00626     else if (i->compare(type,"transformed")) {
00627         EGS_AffineTransform *t = EGS_AffineTransform::getTransformation(i);
00628         if (!t) {
00629             egsWarning("EGS_GeometryTester::getGeometryTester: no "
00630                        "transformation defined for a transformed tester\n");
00631             tester = new EGS_GeometryTester(i);
00632         }
00633         else {
00634             tester = new EGS_TransformedTester(*t,i);
00635             delete t;
00636         }
00637     }
00638     else {
00639         egsWarning("EGS_GeometryTester::getGeometryTester: unknown tester"
00640                    " type %s\n",type.c_str());
00641         tester = new EGS_GeometryTester(i);
00642     }
00643     if (delete_it) {
00644         delete i;
00645     }
00646     return tester;
00647 }
